content: in this legal case a court in monza made a final ruling on a dispute between two parties over the division of an inheritance the court ordered the dissolution of the inheritance and divided the property into two separate lots lot a and lot b they also ordered one party to pay the other a certain amount of money the court rejected a request for reimbursement of expenses related to the property and declared an application for a division proposed by one party as inadmissible the court cited relevant articles of the civil code in their decision the dispute arose from the death of the parents of the parties who had not agreed on the division of the inheritance a courtappointed expert determined that the property could be conveniently divided and prepared a divisional plan the court considered different proposals for the division and ultimately decided on a vertical division taking into account the parties interests the court also addressed the costs of the litigation and the courtappointed expert which were to be shared equally between the parties the decision was made on may 12 2021 and filed on may 18 2021

metadata.cost: 40,775.50 EUR value and shared litigation costs
